header.title: Syntax Highlighter 3 phpbb3 mod
header.description: a small mod that allows the styling of code using javascript and a custom bbcode.
header.author-notes:
once the mod is installed you need to add a new bbcode USAGE [code2={SIMPLETEXT}]{TEXT}[/code2] HTML Replace

{SIMPLETEXT} code

{TEXT}
HELPLINE [code2={required brush without brackets such as html}]some code[/code2] so it looks like [code2=html][/code2] you need to specify a language for each calling of the bbcode by doing this [code2=html]some html code goes here[/code2] or [code2=php]some php code goes here [/code2] so when you call the bbcode you will get this [code2=][/code2] what you do is put your codes between the tags then tell it what type of code is there by doing this [code2=html]some code[/code2] The Brushes are dynamically loaded according to what is called through the bbcodes, meaning the xml,html brush is only loaded if you someone loads a page that is using the [code2=html][/code2] bbcode Please see the contrib/syntax.txt for a detailed list of supported languages and usable aliases all files included use the MIT / GPL v2 license
